CreateReplicationJob.title: CreateReplicationJob
CreateReplicationJob.summary: Creates a migration job for a source server.

CutOverReplicationJob.title: CutOverReplicationJob
CutOverReplicationJob.summary: Stops an incremental migration job that periodically runs. After you call this operation to stop an incremental migration job, the migration job is complete.

DescribeReplicationJobs.title: DescribeReplicationJobs
DescribeReplicationJobs.summary: Queries the details of migration jobs.

DescribeSourceServers.title: DescribeSourceServers
DescribeSourceServers.summary: Queries the information about migration sources.

ListAccessTokens.title: ListAccessTokens
ListAccessTokens.summary: Queries activation codes and the usage details of the activation codes.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the tags that are attached to Server Migration Center (SMC) resources. SMC resources include migration sources and migration jobs.

ModifyReplicationJobAttribute.title: ModifyReplicationJobAttribute
ModifyReplicationJobAttribute.summary: Modifies the parameters of a migration job.

ModifySourceServerAttribute.title: ModifySourceServerAttribute
ModifySourceServerAttribute.summary: Modifies the name and description of a migration source.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Creates tags and adds them to Server Migration Center (SMC) resources. The SMC resources include migration sources and jobs.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes tags that are added to Server Migration Center (SMC) resources. The SMC resources include migration sources and jobs.
